title: [Large-scale] Video-based Learning Design Course for Mentor Competency Enhancement

context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, focusing on developing mentoring competencies for current professionals in social sector vocational training

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three core coaching techniques by analyzing videos of actual mentoring situations.
Learners can propose at least two improvement strategies for mentor-mentee interactions by applying a video-based feedback framework through collaboration with peers.
Learners can develop and implement a mentoring action plan by connecting educational theories to practical cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
